body_html: There are a few problems with your implementation. Most notably, you fail to use ctx.mark_dirty to signal that you've modified a. Secondly, you should use .view(1) instead of .resize(1), because the later results in the output having unspecified contents. Finally, I tried reproducing your issues on master, but it seems to work just fine, so I'm closing the issue as resolved. Thanks for the report!

body: There are a few problems with your implementation. Most notably, you fail to use `ctx.mark_dirty` to signal that you've modified `a`. Secondly, you should use `.view(1)` instead of `.resize(1)`, because the later results in the output having **unspecified** contents. Finally, I tried reproducing your issues on `master`, but it seems to work just fine, so I'm closing the issue as resolved. Thanks for the report!
